Title: Tsumetai chi
Actors: Ryo Ishibashi, Yôzaburô Itô, Eiko Nagashima
Plot: Police detective Sosuke is shot down while chasing down a suspect. While he is unconscious, his gun is stolen. He recovers, but loses his wife and resigns from the police force. All of a sudden, his lost gun used in a series of cr...
